description: A highly packable waterproof-breathable splash top is a great jacket for touring kayakers and canoe trippers to keep stashed away until the deluge comes. The 2.5-layer Hydrus fabric has a relatively soft feel on the outside, with comfortable interior dri-touch print lining on the inside.Hydrus 2.5-layer waterproof-breathable fabric is highly packable.Removable multi-adjustable hood lets you reduce packed volume.Collar is pile-lined for warmth and comfort.Quarter-zip anorak design is easy to pull on in a hurry and is lighter than a full zipper.Adjustable neoprene hook-and-loop closures at waist and wrists keep splashes out.Pocket on upper left sleeve.
name: Kokatat Hydrus Jetty Jacket - Men's
